attributes.name: Deserted Rifle
attributes.description: "Abandoned and musty, who would leave such a fine piece of equipment behind?"
attributes.parsed_description: "Abandoned and musty, who would leave such a fine piece of equipment behind?"

attributes.name: Determination
attributes.description: "The first thing to understand about your enemy is that their will is as strong as yours."
attributes.parsed_description: "The first thing to understand about your enemy is that their will is as strong as yours."

attributes.name: Devout Worry
attributes.description: "No matter your faith, let your concern for others show them who you truly are."
attributes.parsed_description: "No matter your faith, let your concern for others show them who you truly are."

attributes.name: Dewfrost
attributes.description: "The staff glistens in the morning light as rays of light reflect off the fine metal."
attributes.parsed_description: "The staff glistens in the morning light as rays of light reflect off the fine metal."

attributes.name: Diamondhead
attributes.description: "Pure diamond encases the edge of the hatchet, sharpened to the finest point you have ever seen."
attributes.parsed_description: "Pure diamond encases the edge of the hatchet, sharpened to the finest point you have ever seen."

attributes.name: Diamond's Edge
attributes.description: "The smith held the sword aloft and whispered one word to herself: Flawless."
attributes.parsed_description: "The smith held the sword aloft and whispered one word to herself: Flawless."

attributes.name: Diamond's Edge Great Axe
attributes.description: “Expensive.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Expensive.”

attributes.name: Diamond's Head
attributes.description: "The head of a spear is an odd use for such a precious gem, though I suppose it is rather sharp."
attributes.parsed_description: "The head of a spear is an odd use for such a precious gem, though I suppose it is rather sharp."

attributes.name: Diarmud's Icy Grasp
attributes.description: "Diarmud made a name for himself exploring the military applications of magic."
attributes.parsed_description: "Diarmud made a name for himself exploring the military applications of magic."

attributes.name: Diplomacy
attributes.description: "Perhaps my blade will allow us to come to an agreement."
attributes.parsed_description: "Perhaps my blade will allow us to come to an agreement."

attributes.name: Dirtnap
attributes.description: "Spar with me and I will let you rest for eternity."
attributes.parsed_description: "Spar with me and I will let you rest for eternity."

attributes.name: Distant Sovereignity
attributes.description: "Enact your superiority, at a distance."
attributes.parsed_description: "Enact your superiority, at a distance."

attributes.name: Divine Devotion
attributes.description: "I pray that my faith shall set me free."
attributes.parsed_description: "I pray that my faith shall set me free."

attributes.name: Dleihs of Seniab
attributes.description: "Siht exa sdleihs Seniab tsniaga lla slive."
attributes.parsed_description: "Siht exa sdleihs Seniab tsniaga lla slive."

attributes.name: Dominant Discourse
attributes.description: "When this shield is in use, it is hard to get a cutting word in edgewise."
attributes.parsed_description: "When this shield is in use, it is hard to get a cutting word in edgewise."

attributes.name: Dominion of the Doomed
attributes.description: "This is my domain. All who enter, never leave."
attributes.parsed_description: "This is my domain. All who enter, never leave."

attributes.name: Doom, Rifle of the Tempest
attributes.description: “Her rifle was rife with power, blessed by the corrupted High Priest and teeming with dark energy.”
attributes.parsed_description: “Her rifle was rife with power, blessed by the corrupted High Priest and teeming with dark energy.”

attributes.name: Doom's Edge
attributes.description: "Death is far closer than any of us realize."
attributes.parsed_description: "Death is far closer than any of us realize."

attributes.name: Doomsinger's Fire Staff
attributes.name_with_affixes: Doomsinger's Fire Staff of the Scholar
attributes.description: "Her tears blackened and boiled, as though they were oil. She opened her mouth; from her throat came music that ended the minds of all around her."
